message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1200000. This reflects its true worth and the potential it holds for your business.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I'm eager to work with you,  $900000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1050000. This reflects the significant value I believe this product will bring to your company. I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $1050000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
